trans-unit.source: You must agree with our Terms of Service
trans-unit.target: MEGAの利用規約に同意して頂きます。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to create a new MEGA account without accept previously the 'Terms of Service'.

trans-unit.source: Failed to confirm account. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: アカウントを確認できませんでした。再度トライして下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: アカウント確認できず
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your account has been created, confirmed and activated. You will be logged in automatically.
trans-unit.target: あなたのアカウントは作成され、確認済み、作動しています。自動的にログインできます。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully.

trans-unit.target: アカウント有効
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Check your e-mail and click the link to login and confirm your account
trans-unit.target: メールを見てリンクをクリックしてログインした上、あなたのアカウントを確認して下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account.

trans-unit.target: 確認必要
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: MEGA Cloud Drive account creation failed. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: MEGAクラウドドライブアカウントは作成できませんでした。再度トライして下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the creation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: アカウント作成できませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the creation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: フォルダ作成できませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the creation of a folder failed.

trans-unit.target: フォルダ作成失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the creation of a folder failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: フォルダ作成できました。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when create a folder successfully.

trans-unit.target: フォルダ作成できました。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when create a folder successfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to delete item. Please try again [{0}]
trans-unit.target: 削除できず。再度トライして下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to delete a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: 削除できませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to delete a node failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to retrieve a download link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: ダウンロードリンク取得できず。再度トライして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when failed to retrieve a download link.

trans-unit.target: リンク取り戻しできず
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when failed to retrieve a download link - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to download file. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: ファイルのダウンロードできず。再度トライして下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: ダウンロード未完成
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Could not retrieve files and folders from MEGA. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: MEGAからファイルやフォルダを取り戻せませんでした。再度トライして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to fetch nodes from the MEGA cloud service failed.

trans-unit.target: データ取得できず。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to fetch nodes from the MEGA cloud service failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to create folder. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: フォルダ作成できず。再度トライして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to create a folder failed.

trans-unit.target: フォルダ作成失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to create a folder failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: リンク取得できず
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a link to a node failed.

trans-unit.target: リンク取得失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a link to a node failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: プレビューを取り戻せませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image preview failed.

trans-unit.target: プレビューの取り戻し失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image preview failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Image successfully exported to 'saved pictures' album
trans-unit.target: イメージは「保存写真」アルバムにエキスポートされました。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a image is saved/exported successfully saved to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device.

trans-unit.target: イメージ保存済み
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a image is saved/exported successfully saved to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Error exporting image to 'saved pictures' album. Please try again
trans-unit.target: イメージを「保存写真」アルバムにエキスポートできませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to save/export an image to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device.

trans-unit.target: イメージの保存失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to save/export an image to the 'saved pictures' album of the phone device - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: File import failed [{0}]
trans-unit.note:
Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import an image.
Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: インポートできず
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import an image - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The MEGA link was copied to your clipboard
trans-unit.target: MEGAリンクはあなたのクリップボードにコピーされました。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard finished successfully.

trans-unit.target: クリップボードにコピーしました
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: MEGA Cloud Drive login failed. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: MEGAクラウドドライブにログインできず。再度トライして下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the login to the MEGA cloud service api fails. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: ログイン・エラー
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the login to the MEGA cloud service api fails - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Destination folder is the same as the source folder. Move cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 行き先フォルダは発信フォルダと同じです。移動キャンセルしました。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move nodes and the destination folder is the same than the source folder.

trans-unit.target: 移動できず
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move nodes and the destination folder is the same than the source folder - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to move item. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: アイテムの移動できず。もう一度トライして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move a file failed.

trans-unit.target: 移動できず
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move a file failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: パスワードが違います。再度トライして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create a MEGA account and the introduced passwords don't match.

trans-unit.source: The image was saved to your photo album
trans-unit.target: イメージはフォトアルバムに保存されています。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when save successfully a single picture in the photo album.

trans-unit.target: 保存写真
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when save successfully a single picture in the photo album - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to remove {0}?
trans-unit.target: {0}を取り除いていいですか？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove definitely an itemfrom the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to do it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name of the item to be removed in runtime.

trans-unit.target: 取り除きますか？
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed, asking for confirmation to do it - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: 取り除けませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed.

trans-unit.target: 除去失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request remove definitely an item from the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: Item successfully removed
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when remove successfully a node definitely from the rubbish bin.

trans-unit.target: 取り除かれたアイテム
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when remove successfully a node definitely from the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: 改称失敗
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove definitely an item node from the rubbish bin failed.

trans-unit.target: 改称できませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to remove definitely an item node from the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Please fill in your chosen password.
trans-unit.target: あなたのお選びになったパスワードを入れて下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for confirm account are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: Please fill in your name, e-mail address and password
trans-unit.target: あなたのお名前、メールアドレスとパスワードを入力して下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for create account are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: Please fill in your e-mail address and your MEGA password.
trans-unit.target: あなたのメールアドレスとMEGAパスワードを入力して下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for login are not filled in.

trans-unit.target: 必要事項を入力して下さい。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when any required field is not filled in - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Export current image to 'saved pictures' album?
trans-unit.target: 現在のイメージを「保存写真」アルバムにエキスポートしますか？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to save a image to the 'saved pictures' album, asking for confirmation to do it.

trans-unit.target: フォトに保存する
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to save a image to the 'saved pictures' album, asking for confirmation to do it - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You are not logged into MEGA. Please re-login.
trans-unit.target: MEGAにログインしていません。再ログインして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is online and is trying to do any operation that requires connection.

trans-unit.target: オンラインではありません。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the user is online and is trying to do any operation that requires connection - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: サムネール取り戻せず[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image thumbnail failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: サムネール取得できず
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get a image thumbnail failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to retrieve your account details. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: アカウントに関する詳細を取り戻せまんでした。再度トライして下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user account details failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: アカウントに関する詳細は取れませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user account details failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: ログアウトしました。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user logged out successfully.

trans-unit.target: ログアウト済み
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user logged out successfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to logout. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: ログアウトできませんでした。再度トライして下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the logout to the MEGA cloud service api fails. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: ログアウト失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the logout to the MEGA cloud service api fails - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to remove {0} items?
trans-unit.target: {0} コ、取り除きますね？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be removed in runtime.

trans-unit.target: 取り除きますか？
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to remove multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: {0} コを取り除きました。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when remove successfully multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.

trans-unit.target: 取り除きました。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when remove successfully multiple nodes definitely from the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to move item to rubbish bin. Please try again
trans-unit.target: ゴミ箱に入れられませんでした。再度トライして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move nodes to the rubbish bin failed.

trans-unit.target: ゴミ箱への移動失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to move nodes to the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to move {0} to the rubbish bin?
trans-unit.target: {0} をゴミ箱へ移していいですね？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move a single node to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name of the node to be moved in runtime.

trans-unit.target: ゴミ箱に移しますか？
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to move a single node to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Item successfully moved to the rubbish bin
trans-unit.target: ゴミ箱に入れたもの
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when move successfully one single node to the rubbish bin.

trans-unit.target: 動かしたもの
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when move successfully one single node to the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to move {0} items to the rubbish bin?
trans-unit.target: {0} コ、ゴミ箱に入れるんですね？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to move multiple nodes to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.

trans-unit.target: 動かしますか？
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to move multiple nodes to the rubbish bin, asking for confirmation to make the movement - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: {0} items moved to the rubbish bin
trans-unit.target: {0} コがゴミ箱へ入りました。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when move successfully multiple nodes to the rubbish bin. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of nodes to be moved in runtime.

trans-unit.target: 動かしたもの
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when move successfully multiple nodes to the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have {0} pending transfers. Pending transfers will be canceled. Are you sure you want to logout?
trans-unit.target: 待機中の転送が{0} ありますが、これらはキャンセルされます。ログアウトしますか？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to logout the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to logout. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of pending transfers in runtime.

trans-unit.target: 転送待機中
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to logout the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to logout - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have {0} pending transfers. Pending transfers will be canceled. Are you sure you want to exit?
trans-unit.target: 待機中の転送が{0}あります。それらはキャンセルされてしまいますが、それでも出ますか？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to exit the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to exit. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the number of pending transfers in runtime.

trans-unit.target: 転送待機中
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to exit the application and has pending transfers. Asks for confirmation to exit - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The account is already confirmed. You can now login.
trans-unit.target: アカウントは確認済みです。ログインできます。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously.

trans-unit.target: アカウント確認済み
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account that has been already confirmed previously - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: 入力されたパスワードは間違っています。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password.

trans-unit.target: パスワードが違います。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the app requires that the user type the password and the user types a wrong password - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have selected over {0} items ({1}) to download. Do you want to proceed?
trans-unit.target: {0} こ（{1} ）以上のダウンロードを選択しました。そのまま続けますか？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process. Preserve the {0} and ({1}) codes because is for include the maximum reliable download number and the precise number of nodes to be downloaded in runtime.

trans-unit.target: ダウンロードのカウント
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user would try to download at the same time more nodes than the reliable number of simultaneous downloads for a good app performance. This dialog ask confirmation to start the download process - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Do you want to automatically export image files to your photo album after download? You can change this setting on the settings page afterwards. Other file types will only be stored in the local storage of the app.
trans-unit.target: あなたの画像ファイルをダウンロード後、自動的に写真アルバムにエキスポートしますか？この設定は、後で設定ページから変更できます。他のタイプのファイルは、アプリのローカルストレージにのみ保存されます。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards.

trans-unit.target: 転送の一時停止できず
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to pause transfers failed.

trans-unit.target: 一時停止失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to pause transfers failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: 転送続行できませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to resume transfers failed.

trans-unit.target: 続行できませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to resume transfers failed.

trans-unit.source: Please select at least one picture for upload
trans-unit.target: 最低１つの写真をアップロード用に選択して下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element.

trans-unit.target: 写真が選択されていません。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to do a multi image upload and haven't selected any element - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to prepare image: {0} for upload
trans-unit.target: イメージの準備できませんでした: アップロード用{0}
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a image for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.

trans-unit.target: イメージ準備できませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a image for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: 写真アップロードできませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a photo failed.

trans-unit.target: 写真アップロードできませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a photo failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Could not find the selected file
trans-unit.target: 選択したファイルが見つかりません。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to open a file that can't be found and the process failed.

trans-unit.target: ファイル見つからず
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user try to open a file that can't be found and the process failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to open the selected file
trans-unit.target: 選択ファイル開けられず
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to open a file failed.

trans-unit.target: ファイルが開けられません
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to open a file failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to upload the selfie picture
trans-unit.target: セルフィーのアップロードできませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a selfie picture failed.

trans-unit.target: セルフィーのアップロードはできませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a selfie picture failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Could not load files and folders from MEGA. Please try again or click on refresh.
trans-unit.target: MEGAからのファイルとフォルダをロードすることができませんでした。再度トライするか、リフレッシュをクリックして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the nodes of the MEGA cloud service.

trans-unit.target: アップロードできませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the nodes of the MEGA cloud service - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your PIN lock codes do not match. Please re-type them and make sure they are equal
trans-unit.target: あなたのPINコードが合いません。等しくなるように入力し直して下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

trans-unit.source: PIN lock codes do not match
trans-unit.target: PINロックが合っていません。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have been logged out on this device from another location
trans-unit.target: このデバイスは別のロケーションからログアウトしています。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error).

trans-unit.source: Operation not allowed, you will exceed the storage limit of your account. Do you want to upgrade your account?
trans-unit.target: その操作はできません。アカウントのストレージ制限を超えてしまいます。アカウントをアップグレードしますか？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type.

trans-unit.target: クォータ超過！
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have not selected a default download location for your files.To proceed with the download, please select a destination folder or go to preferences in order to set up your default download location.
trans-unit.target:
デフォルトのダウンロード先が選択されていません。
ダウンロードするためには、宛先のフォルダを選択するか、またプレファレンスに行き、ダウンロード先のデフォルト設定をして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to download some nodes and the app doesn't have configured a default download location. Asks the user to select a location for this download or configure a default location.

trans-unit.source: Failed to prepare file: {0} for upload
trans-unit.target: ファイル準備できず: アップロード用{0}
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the file name in runtime.

trans-unit.target: ファイル準備失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: ログアウト済み
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the user is logged out from another location and is trying to do any operation that requires a valid session (API_ESID Error) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to copy the selected file: [{0}]
trans-unit.target: 選択ファイルはコピーできませんでした: [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: ファイルコピー失敗
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed by a non specific cause - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You don't have permission to copy this file type to the destination folder. Are you trying to save/copy a file of an unsupported type to an SD card?Please try to save/copy the file to the your device's internal memory instead.
trans-unit.target: このタイプのファイルを宛先フォルダにコピーする許可がありません。サポートされていないタイプのファイルをSDカードに保存またはコピーしようとされているかと思われます。ご自分のデバイスの内部メモリーに保存/コピーしてみて下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type).

trans-unit.target: 無許可のアクセス
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to copy the Recovery Key to your clipboard. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to copy the Recovery Key to your clipboard. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails to copy the user's Recovery Key to the clipboard to be saved or exported.

trans-unit.target: クリップボード誤動作
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails to copy the user's Recovery Key to the clipboard to be saved or exported - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Current PIN lock is not correct or does not match
trans-unit.target: 現在のPINロックは間違いか、合っていません。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

trans-unit.target: 現在のPINロック不合致
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to change the PIN lock code and introduces an incorrect code into the field for the current PIN lock code - (String as short as possible). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

trans-unit.target: Recovery Key copied to clipboard
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when copy the user's Recovery Key to the clipboard to be saved or exported.

trans-unit.target: Recovery Key copied
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when copy the user's Recovery Key to the clipboard to be saved or exported - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: PIN lock must be at least four digits
trans-unit.target: PINロックは最低４桁でないとダメです。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

trans-unit.target: PINロックが短すぎます。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced code is too short (less than 4 digits). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: キャッシュはクリアーされました。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.

trans-unit.target: クリアーされたキャッシュ
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the cache memory is successfully cleared by user request.

trans-unit.source: Not enough free memory space to complete this operation. The app will shut down now
trans-unit.target: この操作を完了出来るほどのメモリーが空いていません。アプリをシャットダウンします。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device.

trans-unit.target: メモリー限界
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the app exceeds the memory limit quota of the device - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: いいえ、ローカルだけ。
trans-unit.note: Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option to only download into the local folder of the app and don't export automatically to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: ダウンロードのオプション
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Asks if wants to export image files to the photo album after download in future and informs that user can change this option afterwards - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: エキスポートする
trans-unit.note: Button of the dialog displayed the first time that a user want to download a image. Option automatically download to the photo album after downloads - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to select folder. Please, try again or select another folder: [{0}]
trans-unit.target: フォルダ選択できませんでした。再度トライするか、別のフォルダを選択して下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: 失敗したフォルダを選択
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select a folder failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to upload a node failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to select file(s). Please, try again [{0}]
trans-unit.target: ファイルを選択できず。再度トライして下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to select files failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: ファイル選択できず
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to select files failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: 不備メール。やり直して下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user types a malformed email address.

trans-unit.source: Incorrect e-mail address or password. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: アドレス、又はパスワードが違います。再度トライして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to login with an e-mail that is not associated with a MEGA account or type a wrong password. Preserve the MEGA word in uppercase.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {0}?
trans-unit.target: {0}を永久に削除しますね？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user want to delete permanently a node, asking for confirmation to make it. Preserve the {0} code because is for include name of the node to be removed in runtime.

trans-unit.target: 削除しますか？
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user want to delete permanently a node, asking for confirmation to make it - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: ユーザーデータとれず。再度トライして下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user data failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: ユーザーデータとれず
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get the user data failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to capture photo. Please, try again [{0}]
trans-unit.target: フォト撮れず。再度トライして下さい。[{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to capture photo or video failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when trying to open a shortcut. Maybe it is an invalid shortcut or the destination folder was deleted.
trans-unit.target: ショートカットを作ろうとしてエラーが発生しました。ショートカットが無効であるか、行き先フォルダが削除されている可能性があります。

trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the user is trying to open an invalid shortcut - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The credit card information is not correct. The credit card will not be charged.
trans-unit.target: クレジットカードの情報が正しくありませんので、カードには請求されません。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed.

trans-unit.target: クレジットカード保存できず
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to store a user credit card failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Please fill in all the required fields and try again.
trans-unit.target: 必要事項を全て入力し、再度トライして下さい。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for credit card payment are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: The credit card number, month/year of expiration and the CVV should be numeric. Please check that everything is correct and try again.
trans-unit.target: クレジットカード番号、有効期限、認証番号は半角数字での入力となります。再度確認を御願いします。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user fill some data with a wrong format during a credit card payment.

trans-unit.target: 不適フォーマット
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that the user types some data with a wrong format - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You are about to cancel your MEGA subscription. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to help change your mind.
trans-unit.target: You are about to cancel your MEGA subscription. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to help change your mind.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription, asking him send a feedback message.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your feedback! Are you sure you want to cancel your MEGA subscription?
trans-unit.target: フィードバック、ありがとうございます。本当に、MEGA 定期契約をキャンセルしてしまうのですか？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription. This sentence is for give thanks to the user for the feedback sent during the cancellation process and asking for confirmation to do it.

trans-unit.source: The subscription has not been canceled correctly. Please contact support@mega.nz to cancel your subscription.
trans-unit.target: The subscription has not been canceled correctly. Please contact support@mega.nz to cancel your subscription.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed.

trans-unit.target: 定期契約のキャンセルできず
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: 定期契約はキャンセルされました。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully.

trans-unit.target: 契約キャンセル
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: 定期契約キャンセル
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialogs displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Please give us your feedback. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: フィードバックをお聞かせ下さい。ありがとう。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields for cancel subscription are not filled in.

trans-unit.source: The operation failed. Your credit card has not been charged.
trans-unit.target: 正しく処理できませんでした。クレジットカードには請求されません。

trans-unit.target: Failed to prepare file(s) for upload. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare a file(s) for upload failed.

trans-unit.target: Error preparing file(s)
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare file(s) for upload failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to download the file. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to download the file. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed.

trans-unit.target: アップロードできませんでした。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load something (nodes, out shares, in shares, etc.) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to load incoming shared items from MEGA. Please try again or click on refresh.
trans-unit.target: Failed to load incoming shared items from MEGA. Please try again or click on refresh.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the incoming shared items.

trans-unit.source: Failed to load outgoing shared items from MEGA. Please try again or click on refresh.
trans-unit.target: Failed to load outgoing shared items from MEGA. Please try again or click on refresh.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to load the outgoing shared items.

trans-unit.source: Failed to delete settings. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Failed to delete settings. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to delete settings failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: Error deleting settings
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to delete settings failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to load settings. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: Failed to load settings. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to load settings failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: Error loading settings
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to load settings failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to copy the MEGA link to your clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Failed to copy the MEGA link to your clipboard.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard.

trans-unit.target: Error copying link
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to copy a MEGA link to the clipboard - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: If you agree, the current account will be logged out and all Offline data will be erased. Do you want to continue?
trans-unit.target: 同意すれば、現在のアカウントはログアウトされ、全てのオフラインデータは消去されます。このまま続けますか？
trans-unit.note: Message of the warning dialog shown when you try to confirm an account but you are logged in with another one.

trans-unit.source: You are logged in with another account
trans-unit.target: 他のアカウントからすでにログイン中です。
trans-unit.note: Title of the warning dialog shown when you try to confirm an account but you are logged in with another one - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: To access this folder/file, you will need its Decryption key. If you do not have the key, contact the creator of the link.
trans-unit.target: To access this folder/file, you will need its Decryption key. If you do not have the key, contact the creator of the link.
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when you tap on a encrypted file/folder link that can't be opened because it doesn't include the key to see its contents.

trans-unit.target: 復号化鍵を入力してください。
trans-unit.note: Alert title shown when you tap on a encrypted file/folder link that can't be opened because it doesn't include the key to see its contents - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: Invalid decryption key
trans-unit.note: Alert title shown when you have written a decryption key not valid - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: This could be due to the following reasons: - The file has been removed because of a ToS/AUP violation. - Invalid URL – the link you are trying to access does not exist. - The file has been deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: これには次の理由が考えられます。 - Tos/AUP 違反のためファイルが除外された。 - URL が無効。アクセスしようとするリンクが存在しない。 - ユーザーによりファイルが削除された。
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when you open a file link and it's no longer available. It explains the reasons that could be causing it. Keep "\n"

trans-unit.source: This could be due to the following reasons: - The folder link has been removed because of a ToS/AUP violation. - Invalid URL – the link you are trying to access does not exist. - The folder link has been deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: これには次の理由が考えられます。 - Tos/AUP 違反により、フォルダリンクが除去された。 - URLが無効。アクセスしようとするリンクが存在しない。 - ユーザーにより、フォルダリンクが削除された。
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when a folder link doesn't exist. Keep "\n"

trans-unit.target: Unavailable link
trans-unit.note: Error title shown when you open a file or folder link and it's no longer available - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: Open link failed [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to open a link failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.target: Open link failed
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to open a link failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You don't have access to the selected download path. Please select a different download path and try again.
trans-unit.target: You don't have access to the selected download path. Please select a different download path and try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a file/folder failed because the app or the user don't have access permission to the destination folder.

trans-unit.target: 無許可のアクセス
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a file/folder failed because the app or the user don't have access permission to the destination folder

trans-unit.source: Failed to copy item. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to copy item. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a node failed.

trans-unit.target: Copy failed
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a node failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: The log ({0}) will be deleted from the Offline section.
trans-unit.target: The log ({0}) will be deleted from the Offline section.
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when the DEBUG mode is disabled. Preserve the ({0}) code because is for include the file name in runtime.

trans-unit.target: Disable DEBUG mode
trans-unit.note: Alert title shown when the DEBUG mode is disabled - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: A log will be created in the Offline section ({0}).
trans-unit.target: A log will be created in the Offline section ({0}).
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when the DEBUG mode is enabled. Preserve the ({0}) code because is for include the file name in runtime.

trans-unit.target: Enable DEBUG mode
trans-unit.note: Alert title shown when the DEBUG mode is enabled - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Debug mode is enabled. Do you want to disable it?
trans-unit.target: Debug mode is enabled. Do you want to disable it?
trans-unit.note: Message of the alert dialog displayed when the app starts and the DEBUG mode is enable. This alert is to try to avoid that the user forget disable the DEBUG mode and the log file size grows a lot in the offline section.

trans-unit.target: Debug mode
trans-unit.note: Message of the alert dialog displayed when the app starts and the DEBUG mode is enable - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Item shared by the Windows Phone MEGA app.
trans-unit.target: Item shared by the Windows Phone MEGA app.
trans-unit.note: Message or description for the shared resource or the dialog displayed when the user is sharing one item from MEGA with other app of his Windows Phone device - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: Item shared from MEGA
trans-unit.note: Title for the shared resource or the dialog displayed when the user is sharing one item from MEGA with other app of his Windows Phone device - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Items shared by the Windows Phone MEGA app.
trans-unit.target: Items shared by the Windows Phone MEGA app.
trans-unit.note: Message or description for the shared resource or the dialog displayed when the user is sharing multiple items from MEGA with other app of his Windows Phone device - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.target: Items shared from MEGA
trans-unit.note: Title for the shared resource or the dialog displayed when the user is sharing multiple items from MEGA with other app of his Windows Phone device - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a folder.
